===FCC ID=== Airgo Networks Inc. {{•}} FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SA3 SA3] *SA3-AGN3012MP1100 (2006-05-15) - MP312gR Mini PCI 1x2 b/g RoHS Card *SA3-AGN3022MP1100 (2006-04-26) - 2x2 Mini PCI MIMO RoHS Radio Module *SA3-AGN3022UB1100 (2006-01-24) - Airgo 3000 Series USB Adapter 2X2 *SA3-AGN3023PC0100 (2005-10-27) - 802.11b/g Gen3 2x3 Cardbus Adapter *SA3-AGN3023MX0100 (2005-10-24) - 802.11b/g Gen3 2x3 AP Mini PCI Card *SA3-AGN1022PC0100 (2005-07-22) - 802.11b/g 2x2 MIMO Cardbus Adapter *SA3-AGN1012PC0100 (2005-07-22) - 802.11b/g 1x2 Cardbus Adapter *SA3-AGN0922AR0100 (2005-07-22) - 802.11b/g 2x2 AP MIMO Module *SA3-AGN0912AR0100 (2005-07-22) - 802.11b/g 1x2 AP Radio Module *SA3-AGN0901AP0100 (2005-05-06) - 2.4GHz True MIMO Broadband Gateway *SA3-AGN1202AP0000 (2005-05-05) - 802.11a/b/g True MIMO Access Point *SA3-AGN1012MP0200 (2005-03-15) - 802.11a/b/g Mini PCI MISO Type3b Module ==See also== *[[Airgo AGN3023MX-01]] - SA3-AGN3023MX0100 *[[Airgo AGN3023PC-01]] - SA3-AGN3023PC0100 *[[Buffalo WLI2-CB-G108]] *[[Buffalo WLI-CB-G240]] *[[Netgear WPNT511]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
